00030 
00031  SUBROUTINE Differentials
00032 
00033 ! Common Variables
00034  USE Domain,      ONLY : inv12, inv6, ni_f, xmax_f, xmin_f, ymax_f, ymin_f
00035  USE FluidParams, ONLY : gradPhiX_f, gradPhiY_f, lapPhi_f, phi_f
00036  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f
00037  IMPLICIT NONE
00038 
00039 ! Local Variables
00040  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00041 
00042 ! Order parameter
00043  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00044    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00045      phi_f(i,j) = f(i,j,0) + f(i,j,1) + f(i,j,2) + f(i,j,3) + f(i,j,4)
00046    END DO
00047  END DO
00048 
00049 ! Differentials needed for the interfacial terms 
00050  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00051    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00052 
00053      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00054      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00055      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00056      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00057 
00058 ! Laplacian
00059      lapPhi_f(i,j) = ( phi_f(ie,jn) + phi_f(ie,js) + phi_f(iw,jn)          &
00060                    + phi_f(iw,js) + 4.D0*( phi_f(ie,j) + phi_f(iw,j)       &
00061                    + phi_f(i,jn) + phi_f(i,js) ) - 20.D0*phi_f(i,j) )*inv6
00062 ! Gradients
00063      gradPhiX_f(i,j)  = ( 4.D0*( phi_f(ie,j) - phi_f(iw,j) ) + phi_f(ie,jn) &
00064                       - phi_f(iw,js) + phi_f(ie,js) - phi_f(iw,jn) )*inv12
00065 
00066      gradPhiY_f(i,j)  = ( 4.D0*( phi_f(i,jn) - phi_f(i,js) ) + phi_f(ie,jn) &
00067                       - phi_f(iw,js) - phi_f(ie,js) + phi_f(iw,jn) )*inv12
00068 
00069    END DO
00070  END DO
00071 
00072  RETURN
00073  END SUBROUTINE Differentials
00074
